lines.text: I wish you wouldn't speak while I'm interrupting.
[discussing their daughter]
Maria is going to wait until the right man comes along.
Why should she? I didn't.
When do I start dancing?
You do not start dancing.
But didn't you come to see me about?
About one of my daughters. The one you so gallantly referred to as "the inside of a refrigerator"?
Oh... but, I'm afraid I don't follow you.
She thinks you're in love with her.
Would it be rude of me to inquire if there is any insanity in your family?
What's gotten into you, Maria? Nice girls don't act this way.

[Naughtily]
Nice girls don't feel the way I do.
Why, you're brazen!
How could I be... with a heart like an ice cube?
Just think papa, you've been married longer than we've lived!
I consider that a very fortunate coincidence, my dear.
Would you mind very much if I tear myself away from you?
No.

[Cugat stumbles in, obviously listening at the door]
Something in my eye.
A keyhole, no doubt.
I was just thinking, maybe...
No, you do the dancing, I'll do the thinking.
